PackageOracle.name: DA_OFFERING_CUSTOMIZATION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_OFFERING_CUSTOMIZATION
/* Generated on 09-JAN-15 12.05.28.951885000 AM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_offering_customization;

body.name: DA_OFFERING_CUSTOMIZATION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_OFFERING_CUSTOMIZATION
/* Generated on 09-JAN-15 12.05.28.965106000 AM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_customization.add, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || customization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_offering_customization a
(
a.offering_id
,a.customization_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.offering_id
,add.customization_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_customization.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_customization.del, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || customization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_offering_customization a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.offering_id = del.offering_id
AND a.customization_id = del.customization_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_customization.del');

END del;
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_customization.del, parms = ' || offering_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_offering_customization a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.offering_id = del.offering_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_customization.del');

END del;
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_customization.del, parms=' || customization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_offering_customization a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customization_id = del.customization_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_customization.del');

END del;

END da_offering_customization;
